name: Vultair
description:
Vultair is a game in which you must harness yourself from all the hostile elements.

  • Grow food to prevent yourself from starving
  • Build a house to keep enemies at bay
  • Gather materials to help yourself survive easier

What are you waiting for? 

----

Credits to Evan King for allowance to use his awesome music!

This game has been made in little time as a school project some time ago. It might contain bugs and I am not planning on releasing any major updates.
